articles.author: Nick Paton Walsh
articles.title: Trump lays bare his contempt for Europe in blistering new national security plan - CNN
articles.description: “America Alone” might be the simplest précis of the White House’s new National Security Strategy, an extraordinary document released Friday that starkly lays out the administration’s broad foreign policy priorities.
articles.content: America Alone might be the simplest précis of the White Houses new National Security Strategy, an extraordinary document released Friday that starkly lays out the administrations broad foreign policy… [+5703 chars]

articles.author: Evan Bush
articles.title: Volcanic eruption may have catalyzed the plague's arrival in Europe: study - NBC News
articles.description: A study suggests that a volcanic eruption around 1345 cooled the climate, leading to crop failures. On the ships that carried grain to fill the gap came plague-carrying fleas.
articles.content:
When the Black Death swept through Europe beginning in 1347, the plague wiped out more than half of the continents population, upending societies and interrupting wars.
